name: DialogueFight
description:
(It takes a moment to start the Unity WebGL Player. Please be patient.)

DialogFight is my first game for the One Game A Month challange. Inspired by Undertale and my love for Point & Click Adventure games, it's metaphorical, a bit experimental and the concrete story is a bit obfuscated, but the genre-mashup is unique and the story unusual! I hope you enjoy it.

I'd be really happy to recieve feedback! On difficulty and what you thought happened in the story, especially.

If you want to look behind the scenes, the whole Unity project is up on my GitHub!
